name: Fragment: Untitled #1
description:
Fragments is an experimental series of little game/side-projects which are freely can be anything.

Untitled #1 is a re-release of some unfinished stuff I've been working on in Darkplaces Engine a few years ago. There's not really much about it, just wandering around in a very abstract environment.

This Fragment has no ending.

Game will run in borderless mode and will use your desktop resolution and refresh rate.

System requirements:

  • Windows PC
  • ~40 Mb free disk space
